definition: School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Sure, we can go boating there and eat at the farm house.
sentences.chinese: 當然有啦，我們可以划船，還可以喫到農家菜啊。

sentences.english: A little girl came to visit the country home, but was very bored.
sentences.chinese: 一個無聊的小女孩來到了農家院。

sentences.english: Many farm also actively explore some personalized service to appeal to consumers.
sentences.chinese: 不少農家樂還積極開拓一些個性化服務吸引消費者。

sentences.english: The farmyard must be moved, I grant you; but I am not aware of anything else.
sentences.chinese: 跟你說吧，那個農家院肯定要遷移，別的我都不在意。
喜馬拉雅山脈農家，卡林，不丹，1989。

sentences.english: It was a chateau; it is no longer anything but a farm.
sentences.chinese: 它原是一個古堡，現在只是一個農家的莊屋了。

sentences.english: Eat Daze Mountain Grape, farmhouse style products.
sentences.chinese: 喫大澤山葡萄，品農家風情。

sentences.english: Here they had been trying to create a weekend idyll for the urban middle classes.
sentences.chinese: 他們曾試圖讓城市中產階級在週末來這裏享受農家樂。

sentences.english: But the little Red Hen lived happily ever after, in her own little farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 而小紅母雞從此在自己的小農家過上了幸福的生活。

sentences.english: There is a tractor in this farmyard.
sentences.chinese: 在這個農家庭院裏停着一臺拖拉機。

sentences.english: That is the constant and ever-recurring exhortation to the farm children of the Liberated Areas.
sentences.chinese: 反來複去總是拿生產來激勵解放區的農家孩子。

sentences.english: A fairy lady fell in love with a peasant boy.
sentences.chinese: 一個仙女愛上了一個農家子弟。

sentences.english: Perhaps I can revive it with some homegrown COMPOST.
sentences.chinese: 也許可以通過施農家肥是它活過來。

sentences.english: Then one of the farm dogs barked .
sentences.chinese: 接着，一隻農家的狗吠叫起來。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the effects of different landing races on the quality control of Morinda officinalis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討不同農家類型對巴戟天質量的影響。

sentences.english: A farm-woman would be the only sensible kind of wife for him.
sentences.chinese: 娶一個出身農家的姑娘做妻子，這纔是明智的。

definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
